operator.name: Argument Propagation Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A return value has been replaced by a method argument without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Boolean False Return Values Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A primitive or boxed boolean has been replaced with false without being detected by a test

operator.name: Boolean True Return Values Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A primitive or boxed boolean has been replaced with true without being detected by a test

operator.name: Conditionals Boundary Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A relational operator has been replaced by a boundary counterpart without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Constructor Call Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A constructor call has been removed without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Empty Object Return Values Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: An object return value has been replaced with its empty counterpart without being detected by a test

operator.name: Increments Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A local variable increment/decrement has been replaced without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Inline Constant Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: An inline constant has been changed without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Invert Negs Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A number has been replaced by its opposite without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Math Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A binary arithmetic operation has been replaced by another one without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Negate Conditionals Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A conditional expression has been negated without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Non Void Method Call Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A method call has been removed without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Null Return Values Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A non-primitive return value has been replaced with null without being detected by a test

operator.name: Primitive Returns Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A primitive number return value has been replaced with 0 without being detected by a test

operator.name: Remove Conditional Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A condition has been removed without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Return Values Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: The return value of a method call has been replaced without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Void Method Call Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A method call has been removed without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Member Variable Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A member variable assignment has been replaced without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Naked Receiver Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A non-void method call has been removed and replaced with its receiver without being detected by a test

operator.name: Remove Increments Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: An increment operation has been removed without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Remove Switch Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A switch statement has been replaced with the default label without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Return Values Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: A return value has been replaced without being detected by a test.

operator.name: Switch Mutator
operator.violationDescription: Alive Mutant: The default label has been replaced without being detected by a test.
